title: Class start reminder
subject: Class start reminder
content:
Hello [#MEMBER_NAME#],

 

This is a friendly reminder that your [#CLASS_TYPE#] will be happening in the next 24 hours.

 

Details:

Class type: [#CLASS_TYPE#]

Date: [#CLASS_DATE#]

Start Time: [#CLASS_START#]

End Time: [#CLASS_END#]

Studio: [#CLASS_STUDIO#]

Location: [#CLASS_LOCATION#]

 

Thank you!

title: Email Verification
subject: [#SUBJECT#]
content:
Please click the button below to verify your email address.

 

[#ACTION_BUTTON#]

 

If you did not create an account, no further action is required.
content_plain:
Please click the button below to verify your email address.
 
[#ACTION_BUTTON#]
 
If you did not create an account, no further action is required.

title: Reset Password
subject: [#SUBJECT#]
content:
You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.

 

[#ACTION_BUTTON#]

 

This password reset link will expire in [#EXPIRY_MINUTES#] minutes.

 

If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.
content_plain:
You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.
 
[#ACTION_BUTTON#]
 
This password reset link will expire in [#EXPIRY_MINUTES#] minutes.
 
If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.
